list.name: infobase
list.query: SELECT DISTINCT infobase_name FROM logs.event_log WHERE infobase_name != '' ORDER BY infobase_name

list.name: user
list.query: SELECT DISTINCT user_name FROM logs.event_log WHERE user_name != '' ORDER BY user_name

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  toDateTime(intDiv(toUInt32(event_time), 300) * 300) AS time,
  level,
  count() AS count
FROM logs.event_log
WHERE $__timeFilter(event_time)
  AND ($infobase = '$__all' OR infobase_name IN ($infobase))
  AND ($user = '$__all' OR user_name IN ($user))
GROUP BY time, level
ORDER BY time

SELECT
  toDateTime(intDiv(toUInt32(event_time), 300) * 300) AS time,
  event_presentation AS event,
  count() AS count
FROM logs.event_log
WHERE $__timeFilter(event_time)
  AND ($infobase = '$__all' OR infobase_name IN ($infobase))
  AND ($user = '$__all' OR user_name IN ($user))
GROUP BY time, event
ORDER BY time, count DESC
LIMIT 10

SELECT
  toDateTime(intDiv(toUInt32(event_time), 300) * 300) AS time,
  user_name AS user,
  count() AS count
FROM logs.event_log
WHERE $__timeFilter(event_time)
  AND ($infobase = '$__all' OR infobase_name IN ($infobase))
  AND ($user = '$__all' OR user_name IN ($user))
  AND user_name != ''
GROUP BY time, user
ORDER BY time, count DESC
LIMIT 10

SELECT
  event_presentation AS event,
  count() AS count
FROM logs.event_log
WHERE $__timeFilter(event_time)
  AND ($infobase = '$__all' OR infobase_name IN ($infobase))
  AND ($user = '$__all' OR user_name IN ($user))
GROUP BY event
ORDER BY count DESC
LIMIT 15

SELECT
  event_time AS "Дата, время",
  data_separation AS "Разделение данных сеанса",
  user_name AS "Пользователь",
  computer AS "Компьютер",
  application_presentation AS "Приложение",
  event_presentation AS "Событие",
  transaction_status AS "Статус транзакции",
  metadata_presentation AS "Метаданные"
FROM logs.event_log
WHERE $__timeFilter(event_time)
  AND ($infobase = '$__all' OR infobase_name IN ($infobase))
  AND ($user = '$__all' OR user_name IN ($user))
ORDER BY event_time DESC
LIMIT 1000
